skills.name: Battle Cry
skills.description: Increases damage dealt by 20% and armor by 30% for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: Deals 100 physical damage to all enemies within a radius of 5 meters.

skills.name: Shield Wall
skills.description: Absorbs up to 500 damage and increases block chance by 50% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Critical Strike
skills.description: Increases critical strike chance by 30% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: Turns invisible for 15 seconds and moves 20% faster.

skills.name: Backstab
skills.description: Deals 200 physical damage to a target from behind.

name: Alex

skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: Deals 150 magic damage to all enemies within a radius of 5 meters.

skills.name: Element Shield
skills.description: Absorbs up to 300 magic damage and reflects 20% of incoming damage back to enemies for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Teleport
skills.description: Teleports to a targeted location within a range of 10 meters.

disadvantages: Vulnerable to physical damage and low health

skills.name: Agility Boost
skills.description: Increases agility by 20% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodges the next 2 attacks within 10 seconds.

skills.name: Swiftness
skills.description: Increases movement speed by 30% for 15 seconds.

name: Stephen

skills.name: Poison Strike
skills.description: Deals 100 physical damage and applies a poison effect that deals 20 damage over 5 seconds.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: Turns invisible for 15 seconds and moves 20% faster.

skills.name: Disarm
skills.description: Disarms a target, reducing their damage output by 20% for 10 seconds.

disadvantages: Vulnerable to physical damage in combat

name: Lauren

skills.name: Healing Potion
skills.description: Restores 200 health to the Alchemist.

skills.name: Buff Potion
skills.description: Increases damage output by 20% and armor by 10% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Damage Over Time
skills.description: Applies a poison effect that deals 20 damage over 5 seconds to all enemies within a radius of 3 meters.

disadvantages: Vulnerable to magic damage and limited combat capabilities

name: Angel

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Restores 150 health to all allies within a radius of 5 meters.

skills.name: Shield of Light
skills.description: Absorbs up to 300 damage and increases block chance by 20% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Holy Bolts
skills.description: Deals 100 magic damage to a target and silences them for 5 seconds.

disadvantages: Vulnerable to physical damage in combat

name: Milton

skills.name: Healing Hands
skills.description: Restores 100 health to a target ally.

skills.name: Cleansing Aura
skills.description: Removes all negative effects from all allies within a radius of 5 meters.

skills.name: Resurrection
skills.description: Revives a dead ally with 50% health.

disadvantages: Vulnerable to magic damage and limited combat capabilities

name: Xeno

skills.name: Summon Skeleton
skills.description: Summons a skeleton that deals 50 physical damage to enemies within a radius of 3 meters for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Drain Life
skills.description: Drains 20 health from all enemies within a radius of 3 meters and heals the Necromancer for 10 health.

skills.name: Curse of Death
skills.description: Deals 100 magic damage to a target and reduces their damage output by 20% for 10 seconds.

advantages: Ability to summon and control undead minions
disadvantages: Vulnerable to physical damage and limited health

name: William

skills.name: Diving Bomb
skills.description: Deals 100 physical damage to all enemies within a radius of 3 meters and stuns them for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Deploy Turret
skills.description: Deploys a turret that deals 50 physical damage to enemies within a radius of 3 meters for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Rocket Jump
skills.description: Launches the Engineer 10 meters in the air, dealing 20 physical damage to enemies within a radius of 3 meters.

advantages: Ability to create and repair complex devices
disadvantages: Vulnerable to magic damage and limited combat capabilities

name: Lieutenant

skills.name: Fortify
skills.description: Increases armor by 50% and block chance by 30% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Smash
skills.description: Deals 150 physical damage to all enemies within a radius of 3 meters and stuns them for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Unstoppable
skills.description: Increases movement speed by 20% and makes the Juggernaut immune to crowd control effects for 10 seconds.

disadvantages: Low agility and vulnerable to magic damage
